price: 46. Yalli Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunuk iyyehikaak mameesitina;diggah anu qokol kee catoh siinî luk ayyooh, siinik iyyam aabbeeh, siinik abam ablehik,
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
